Title: Architecture and frontal cortical connections of the premotor cortex (area 6) in the rhesus monkey

@InterMapRelations.Comments: BP87 is missing from our archive!

@InterMapRelations_clean.Comments: BP87 is missing from our archive!

@Injections.Citation: "…isotope injection in caudal area 6 at the level of the precentral dimple (area 6DC)…"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "In this case label was found in rostral area 6 in and around the upper limb of the arcuate sulcus. Caudally labeled grains were observed in clusters within area 4 that extended into the rostral bank of the central sulcus. on the medial surface label was observed above the cingulate sulcus in area MII, in medial area 4, and in the depth of the cingulate sulcus."

@Injections.Citation: "An isotope injection in the rostral part of area 6 (area 6DR)…"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Rostrally labeled grains were observed in areas 46, 9 and 8 above the principal sulcus…Caudally distinct bands of label were found within dorsal area 6 above and below the superior precentral dimple. Medially label was found in area 6 within the supplementary motor area MII…and in area 24 at the level of the precentral gyrus. Finally, a small cluster of label was seen ventral to the injection site in the depth of the arcuate sulcus."

@Injections.Citation: "…isotope injection in ventral area 6 (in areas 6Va and 6Vb)…"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "…label was observed in both ventral and dorsal parts of the frontal cortex…Ventrally label was observed in three main sites: the prefrontal, precentral, and opercular cortices. Rostral to the injection site these regions included an area below the principal sulcus within area 46 and area 12. Caudal to the injection site, label was found in the central portion of the precentral gyrus in areas 4C…and 4…and extended into the adjacent rostral bank of the precentral sulcus. Ventrally label was noted around the inferior precentral dimple in area 3a and in the frontal operculum. The latter included a gustatory area rostrally…,area proM of Sanides ('70) or pK of Jones and Burton ('76)…and areas 1,2, and SII in the pericentral operculum…In dorsal frontal cortex label was found in area 6DR above the arcuate sulcus and in the depths of the cingulate sulcus (area MII). A small cluster of label was also observed in the cingulate gyrus and adjacent sulcal cortex (area 24) at the level of the precentral gyrus…"

@Injections.Citation: "…an HRP-injection in dorsal area 6 between the superior precentral dimple and the spur of the arcuate sulcus (area 6DC)…"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "…labeled neurons were found in the caudal bank of the upper limb of the arcuate sulcus (area 6), in medial area 6, and in the depths of the cingulate sulcus…In this case there was no evidence of label in the prefrontal cortex. On the other hand, labeled neurons were observed in the central portion of the precentral gyrus extending into the central sulcus…"

@Injections.Citation: "...HRP-injections in dorsal area 6 behind the arcuate sulcus *area (6DR)…"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "…HRP-positive neurons were found mainly in the dorsal part of the frontal cortex…Rostrally, labeled neurons were observed in area 6 in the caudal bank of the arcuate sulcus and in dorsal prefrontal areas 46 and 9. Caudally, labeled cells were found in area 6 around the superior precentral dimple…On the medial surface labeled cells were mainly found in the rostral part of area 6 up to the dorsal bank of the cingulate sulcus in area MII…"
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Comments: MII and 6DC extend to the fundus of the cingulate sulcus (Fig. 1), therefore the labeled neurons in the upper bank of the cingulate sulcus in Fig. 9 do not belong to area 24.

@Injections.Citation: "In two animals injections of HRP were placed in ventral area 6 behind the caudal bank of the lower limb of the arcuate sulcus. In one of these cases the injection site was in both areas 6Va and 6Vb…and in the other it was mostly in area 6Vb…The basic pattern of labeled neurons in the frontal lobe was similar in these two cases."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "…HRP-positive  neurons were found in both dorsal and ventral sectors of the frontal lobe…Ventrally labeled neurons were found in neighboring premotor area 6, in prefrontal areas 46, 10…and 12…and in the frontal opercular and insular cortex. Labeled neurons were found in area 8 in only one of these two cases, in which the HRP injection extended into the depths of the caudal bank of the arcuate sulcus…Within the frontal operculum HRP-positive neurons were found in the gustatory region, area proM, opercular areas 1-2, and the insula. Behind the injection site, labeled neurons were found in the central portion of the precentral gyrus, extending into the rostral bank of the central sulcus…Some labeled neurons were also observed in the vicinity of the inferior precentral dimple in area 3a…In the dorsal and medial parts of the frontal cortex labeled neurons were observed in two regions. One of these included an area between the superior precentral dimple and the cingulate sulcus (MII…) and the other was in the depths of the cingulate sulcus."

publication.title: Architecture and frontal cortical connections of the premotor cortex (area 6) in the rhesus monkey
